description:
In the final bout of the semi-finals, it`s the mysterious Magensha versus Domon! But there`s also another Magensha hunting down Yanagi. Which is which? And where did Fuko go?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fire Dragon Combo: The Opponent Beyond the Ring!!
Hiryuu Gattai!! Ring Gai no Teki!!
火竜合体!! リング外の敵!!
